sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) The character may take the Hunter's Quarry action against an opponent within long range, making a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Survival check. If the check succeeds, upgrade the ability of all attacks made against the target by one until the end of the character's next turn.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Hunter's Quarry</name> <number>TAL0001314</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-19 04:24:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>54eb85882f030d10e0f497eef699b601</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 04:24:17</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
